comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Well, @Agbe, I must say that I love the bold step you took to request the sub-board, and like I commented there, it will be nice that Theymos consider giving the Nigeria LB some sub-board because it will make the board look more clean. Since we normally see some topics as spam or shitposts, those members who're great at such posts can do it on the off-topic sub-board, and it will be the choice of any member here to visit the off-topic sub-board or not. One thing I have noticed on the forum is that spamming and shit posting is something that is continuous, and that's the reason why some members don't visit the altcoins discussion and off-topic board because they believe it is full of spam. The same thing will be applicable to the LB if there are sub-boards. Members of this LB will have to choose their best sub-board to join the discussion, like myself, who is more interested in economics and investment. I have already dropped my comment there, and I believe if we also have sub-boards, then it will be easier to get a moderator if anyone is willing to take responsibility and apply as one.

comments.body: I really appreciate everyone for their encouragement, it was not easy to take a such a bold step. But we have to do it so that the board will be presented both outside and inside. I am only doing this to make di board clean which I promised from the first time the board was created. I am not here to hurt anyone but to make you good and strong on bitcoin. If I was very bad in the forum then I will not want my younger ones to be like that and I want them to have the good knowledge of bitcoin and cryptocurrency at large. I am for everyone's good. I am not doing it for personal interest or for vain glory. Who knows me in the forum no one. Wen God don shama me with blessings, I go commot from forum cs di stress e too much. I go relax small before I go come back again. And for di main time make we clean our board. I like di way di board dey now. All di threads people dey create e dey make sense. Let di good work continue.
